definition: worm-like invertebrate/mythical animal (see 獬豸[xie4 zhi4])/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 153)
surname Shao/name of an ancient state that existed in what is now Shaanxi Province
to call together/to summon/to convene/temple or monastery (used in place names in Inner Mongolia)

Diaochan (-192), one of the four legendary beauties 四大美女[si4 da4 mei3 nu:3], in fiction a famous beauty at the break-up of Han dynasty, given as concubine to usurping warlord Dong Zhuo 董卓[Dong3 Zhuo2] to ensure his overthrow by fighting hero Lü Bu 呂布|吕布[Lu:3 Bu4]
lit. to use a dog's tail as a substitute for sable fur (idiom)/fig. a worthless sequel to a masterpiece
Cape San Diego or Santiao, easternmost point of Taiwan Island
lit. to trade a fur coat for wine (idiom)/fig. (of wealthy people) to lead a dissolute and extravagant life

sentences.english: Is natural diet right for your ferret ?
sentences.chinese: 自然的饮食来源对貂是好的吗？

sentences.english: Small ferret-like badger of southeast asia.
sentences.chinese: 产于东南亚象雪貂的獾。

sentences.english: Does the rewired ferret come to hear with its eyes?
sentences.chinese: 重新接线的雪貂用它的眼睛来听声音吗？

sentences.english: Eurasian marten having a brown coat with pale breast and throat.
sentences.chinese: 欧亚大陆的貂，褐色皮毛，雄部和。

sentences.english: Long-deceased trees cling stubbornly to the steep flanks of Grand Sable Dunes in Michigan's Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore.
sentences.chinese: 一些长期干枯的树木紧紧地陷在大貂丘那陡峭的侧面。

sentences.english: Ferrets are another mammalian species known to be susceptible to infection.
sentences.chinese: 雪貂是另一种已知易受感染的哺乳类动物物种。

sentences.english: Ferrets should be immunized for Rabies and Canine Distemper using only vaccines approved for use in ferrets.
sentences.chinese: 每年打针可以使用与雪貂的狂犬疫苗和犬瘟热疫苗。

sentences.english: Consider the ermine: a stoat in winter fur.
sentences.chinese: 看那貂，是只披着过冬皮毛的鼬鼠。

sentences.english: No one in this world needs a mink coat but a mink.
sentences.chinese: 除了貂没有人需要貂皮。

sentences.english: Remember, ferrets are very intelligent animals.
sentences.chinese: 记住，宠物貂是非常聪明的动物。

sentences.english: It was set in 1981 by Reg Mellor, whose trick was to make sure the ferrets were well-fed before putting them in his pants.
sentences.chinese: 他的秘诀在于要确保雪貂放进裤子之前已经被喂饱了。

sentences.english: The south temple loves Wen to feel small sable a return to the temple of You Qiang to start to interrogate the circumstance of Yi snow.
sentences.chinese: 南宫恋雯抱着小貂一回到幽蔷宫就询问起伊雪的情况。

sentences.english: One of the most common conditions to occur in ferrets is adrenal disease.
sentences.chinese: 其中最常见的条件，发生在雪貂是肾上腺疾病。

sentences.english: The monographs on criminal law have been published, but there is still room for further discussion.
sentences.chinese: 刑法研究方面虽有专著面世，但仍可续貂。
我的良心开始感到刺痛貂。

definition: raccoon dog (Nyctereutes procyonoides)/raccoon of North China, Korea and Japan (Japanese: tanuki)/also pr. [hao2]
silver or black fox (Vulpes alopex argentatus)
